QueryToExecute:
select
  launch_configuration_arn as resource,
  case
    when associate_public_ip_address then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when associate_public_ip_address then title || ' public IP enabled.'
    else title || ' public IP disabled.'
  end as reason
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_ec2_launch_configuration;
